example_sentence_english: I want to occupy that seat.
I was occupying a small office.
You were occupying too much time.

translation_english: he was occupying/she was occupying/you (formal) were occupying

example_sentence_english: You (plural) were occupying the hall often.

translation_english: he has occupied/she has occupied/you (formal) have occupied
notes: used with auxiliary avere; also used as formal 'Lei'
